nl.tue.fingerpaint.client.model

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.fingerpaint.client.model.Geometry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RectangleGeometry

    public abstract class Geometry
extends Object
    Abstract class representing a geometry
    Author:
    Project Fingerpaint

      static interface  Geometry.StepAddedListener
      Interface for a listener for protocol steps

      The distance between two arrows

      The total width of a single arrow

      The width of the arrows on the walls
      protected static int SWIPE_THRESHOLD
      Threshold in pixels to decide when a large enough swipe has been carried out to define a protocol step.

      Stores the x-coordinate of the mouse event that initiates a wall movement.

      Stores the y-coordinate of the mouse event that initiates a wall movement.

      true if the top wall is being moved, false otherwise

      The background colour of the walls
      protected static Colour wallStripeColor
      The colour of the arrows on the walls

      Distance between left border of the canvas and the left border of the drawing area.

      • createCanvas

        protected void createCanvas(int height,
                int width)
        Initialisation method which creates the canvas. Also initialises and adds MouseHandlers to the canvas. If the browser doesn't support HTML5 canvas, adds a message stating this to the RootPanel and returns.
        Parameters:
        height - The height of the canvas to be created
        width - The width of the canvas to be created

               int y)
        Code to execute on a MouseDown event.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the event, relative to the canvas
        y - The y-coordinate of the event, relative to the canvas

        Code to execute on a MouseOut event.

      • removeMouseMoveHandler

        private void removeMouseMoveHandler(int xStop)
        Removes the mouseMoveHandler from the canvas, if it is present. If defining a step has been ended, an animation is started to move the walls back to their initial position.
        Parameters:
        xStop - The x-coordinate, relative to the start coordinates of the mouse movement, at which the mouse movement was ended.

      • initialiseDistribution

        protected abstract void initialiseDistribution()
        Initialises the distribution of the drawing area

      • drawWalls

        protected abstract void drawWalls()
        Draws the outline around the walls

      • fillWall

        protected abstract void fillWall(int xOffset,
            boolean topWal)
        Colours the inside of one of the walls of the geometry.
        Parameters:
        xOffset - The x-distance to the initial position
        topWal - true if the top wall has to be filled, false otherwise

      • drawGeometryOutline

        protected abstract void drawGeometryOutline()
        Draws the border around the drawing area

      • clipGeometryOutline

        protected abstract void clipGeometryOutline()
        Clips the drawing area, so that drawing outside of the drawing area is not possible

      • removeClippingArea

        protected void removeClippingArea()
        Clips the entire canvas

      • isInsideDrawingArea

        protected abstract boolean isInsideDrawingArea(int x,
                          int y)
        Returns whether the position (x, y) is inside the drawing area on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate relative to the top-left corner of the canvas
        y - The y-coordinate relative to the top-left corner of the canvas
        Returns:
        true if coordinates (x, y) are inside the drawing area. false otherwise.

      • isInsideTopWall

        protected abstract boolean isInsideTopWall(int x,
                      int y)
        Returns whether the position (x, y) is inside the top wall on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate relative to the top-left corner of the canvas
        y - The y-coordinate relative to the top-left corner of the canvas
        Returns:
        true if coordinates (x, y) are inside the top wall. false otherwise.

      • isInsideBottomWall

        protected abstract boolean isInsideBottomWall(int x,
                         int y)
        Returns whether the position (x, y) is inside the bottom wall on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate relative to the top-left corner of the canvas
        y - The y-coordinate relative to the top-left corner of the canvas
        Returns:
        true if coordinates (x, y) are inside the bottom wall. false otherwise.

      • drawLine

        private void drawLine(int x1,
            int y1,
            int x2,
            int y2)
        Draws a line manually, filling a single pixel at a time. Can't use the standard 'drawLine()' method for this purpose, since this makes it impossible to update internal representation. Algorithm obtained from the Internet. Source: http://tech-algorithm.com/articles /drawing-line-using-bresenham-algorithm/
        Parameters:
        x1 - x-coordinate, relative to the canvas element, of the start point of the line
        y1 - y-coordinate, relative to the canvas element, of the start point of the line
        x2 - x-coordinate, relative to the canvas element, of the end point of the line
        y2 - y-coordinate, relative to the canvas element, of the end point of the line

      • startDefineMixingStep

        protected void startDefineMixingStep(int mouseX,
                         int mouseY)
        Together with stopDefineMixingStep(), this function checks whether the protocol should be updated by adding a new Step. This particular function only stores the coordinates of the press event, to calculate the distance travelled when the mouse or the user's finger is lifted from the canvas.
        Parameters:
        mouseX - x-coordinate of the mouseEvent.
        mouseY - y-coordinate of the mouseEvent.

      • stopDefineMixingStep

        protected abstract void stopDefineMixingStep(int mouseX,
                        int mouseY)
        Together with startDefineMixingStep(), this function checks whether the protocol should be updated by adding a new Step. This particular function should be implemented by geometries to detail when and how a new Step should be defined.
        Parameters:
        mouseX - x-coordinate of the mouseEvent.
        mouseY - y-coordinate of the mouseEvent.

      • determineSwipe

        protected abstract MixingStep determineSwipe(int mouseX,
                        int mouseY)
        Should return the direction and wall of the current swiping movement. should return null if the swipe is not a valid swipe. This method should additionally draw a graphic to display that a swiping motion is in progress
        Parameters:
        mouseX - The x-coordinate of the current mouse position.
        mouseY - The y-coordinate of the current mouse position.
        Returns:
        The direction and wall of the current swiping movement, or null if the swipe is not valid.

      • getToolImage

        private com.google.gwt.dom.client.ImageElement getToolImage(int size,
                                                  com.google.gwt.canvas.dom.client.ImageData img)
        Creates and returns an image element with the image data belonging to the drawing tool.
        Parameters:
        size - The width and height of the dummy canvas, equal to the width (and height) of the drawing tool
        img - The ImageData belonging to the drawing tool
        Returns:
        The created image element

      • getValidCoord

        protected int getValidCoord(int c)
        Converts a value to a valid coordinate, meaning the a value representing the top left pixel of a 'grid-pixel'
        Parameters:
        c - The coordinate to convert
        Returns:
        The valid coordinate belonging to input c

      • drawDistribution

        public abstract void drawDistribution(int[] dist)
        Sets the given distribution as the current distribution, and draws it on the canvas
        Parameters:
        dist - The distribution to be set and drawn

        Returns the string representation of the .svg image of the canvas

        The string representation of the .svg image of the canvas

      • resetDistribution

        public abstract void resetDistribution()
        Resets the current distribution to all white
